title: This is the most excited I've been over a patch
body: I just love the art that riot makes and characters they do. But this one has got me so excited for it! I'm genuinely interested about Ornn and I don't even play tank! And don't get me started on the Star Guardian event because omg I'm dying. They made the star guardians even better and the new game mode looks just as amazing and spectacular. Congratulations Riot! I really can't wait for 2 weeks for it!

replies.body: I'm glad someone is happy about the new Star Guardians.

h y p e !

Who's your favorite Star Guardian? 

*By the way, I know you'd mentioned two weeks, but as a fair warning, the Star Guardian skins won't be out until September 7th!*

they do look good but that {{champion:16}} SG ! such hair such colors! SO GREAT!

i dont know if its because i love Soraka or the fact that being a star guardian just suits the star child, but her outfit just stands out among all other star guardians (to me personally at least) before this i use to think that about Janna's skin but Soraka stole that torch from her!

dont get me wrong MF and syndra,etc, definitely look good as well just not as much!
